TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionSecurityTokenHandler extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler

summary.span: 类型的 进程安全标志。

span.span: A that processes security tokens of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类序列化、反序列化和验证会话令牌。The class serializes, deserializes, and validates session tokens. 会话令牌是类型为的令牌。Session tokens are tokens of type . 类将标记序列化为 cookie 格式。The class serializes the tokens to and from cookie format. 默认情况下, 类将标记序列化为 ws 安全会话 Feb2005 或 ws 安全会话 1.3 ``元素。By default, the class serializes tokens into WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `` elements. 会话令牌由 (WSFAM) 和 (SAM) 用于存储有关会话的信息, 这主要是与经过身份验证的用户和会话的开始和到期时间关联的。Session tokens are used by the (WSFAM) and the (SAM) to store information about a session, this is primarily the associated with the authenticated user and the session start and expiration times. 在被动方案中, 从身份验证管道调用到 (SAM), 以从表示经过身份验证的用户的中创建会话令牌。In passive scenarios, the calls into the (SAM) from the authentication pipeline to create a session token from the that represents the authenticated user. SAM 使用其配置的来创建令牌并将其序列化为 cookie (并在后续请求中从 cookie 反序列化令牌)。The SAM uses its configured to create the token and to serialize it into a cookie (and to deserialize the token from a cookie on subsequent requests). SAM 使用其已配置类的实例将 cookie 写入 HTTP 响应。The SAM uses an instance of its configured class to write the cookie back to the HTTP Response. 然后, 将此 cookie 返回给客户端, 并在后续的请求中, 客户端可以提供 cookie, 而不是向标识提供程序重新获取安全令牌。This cookie is then returned to the client and on subsequent requests the client can present the cookie rather than making a round trip back to the identity provider to re-obtain a security token. 有关会话如何与 WIF 操作的详细信息, 请参阅[WIF 会话管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。For more information about how sessions operate with WIF, see [WIF Session Management](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md). > [!NOTE] > SecurityTokenHandlers > 配置元素可用于指定负责保护应用程序会话的。 \<The \ configuration element can be used to specify a that has the responsibility for securing the application's sessions. 在更改此配置设置时, 开发人员应小心, 因为配置错误的系统可能会导致应用程序受到损害。Developers should use caution when changing this configuration setting, as a misconfigured system could result in application compromise. 例如, 指定派生并将空的转换 (CookieTransform) 集合传递给基, 会导致将用户标识序列化为未受保护的 cookie。For example, specifying a derived and passing an empty Transforms (CookieTransform) collection to the base, would result in the users identity being serialized into a cookie that was not protected. 这会使攻击者能够修改身份, 从而更改访问权限。This could allow an attacker to modify the identity and therefore change access privileges. 如果会话令牌处于引用模式, 即其属性为`true`, 则会话令牌处理程序只会序列化在中重新生成其密钥所需的会话令牌的属性。If the session token is in reference mode, that is, its property is `true`, the session token handler only serializes properties of the session token that are needed to regenerate its key in the . 默认情况下, 类用于表示缓存键, 而标记处理程序则写入令牌的和属性。In the default case, the class is used to represent cache keys, and the token handler writes the and properties of the token. 如果会话令牌不在引用模式下 (即 , 属性为, 则除了前面提到的属性外, 处理程序还会`false`从令牌序列化的字节数组调用方法, 并存储cookie 中的结果值。If the session token is not in reference mode, that is, the property is `false`, then, in addition to the properties mentioned previously, the handler invokes the method on a byte array serialized from the token and stores the resulting value in the cookie as well. 有关如何序列化令牌的更多详细信息, 请参阅方法。For more details about how the token is serialized, see the method. 属性获取在方法中应用到会话令牌的转换的列表。The property gets the list of transforms that are applied to the session token in the method. 所有转换均派生自类。All transforms derive from the class. 在默认情况下 , 将应用和。In the default case the and the are applied. 使用数据保护 API (DPAPI) 来保护 cookie 材料。The uses the Data Protection API (DPAPI) to protect the cookie material. DPAPI 使用特定于计算机的密钥, 该密钥在其保护算法中运行。DPAPI uses a key that is specific to the computer on which it is running in its protection algorithms. 出于此原因, 默认会话令牌处理程序在 Web 场方案中不可用, 因为在这种情况下, 在一台计算机上写入的令牌可能需要在另一台计算机上进行读取。For this reason, the default session token handler is not usable in Web farm scenarios because, in such scenarios, tokens written on one computer may need to be read on another computer. 您可以使用多种策略来避免此问题。You can use many strategies to circumvent this issue. 例如，你可以：For example, you can: - 用替换默认值。 Replace the default with the . 允许你在配置文件中的 ASP.NET ``元素下指定签名和加密密钥。 The enables you to specify signing and encryption keys under the ASP.NET `` element in the configuration file. - 为 global.asax.cs 文件中的事件提供处理程序, 并将默认会话标记处理程序替换为具有包含 和的转换列表的实例。Provide a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and replace the default session token handler with an instance of that has a list of transforms that includes the and the . 可以通过调用采用转换列表的构造函数之一来创建新的实例。You can create the new instance by invoking one of the constructors that takes a list of transforms. - 从基类派生自定义转换, 并使用上面的方法将其包含在要应用的转换的列表中。Derive a custom transform from the base class and use the method above to include it in the list of transforms to be applied. - 从派生自定义令牌处理程序并实现你自己的机制。Derive a custom token handler from and implement your own mechanism. 有关在 Web 场方案中使用会话的详细信息, 请参阅[WIF 和 Web 场](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。For more information about using sessions in Web farm scenarios, see [WIF and Web Farms](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md). 包含在默认标记处理程序集合中; 但是, 你可以将其替换为自定义会话标记处理程序, 方法是[ <先>在](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md) [ <securityTokenHandlers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md)元素从集合中删除默认处理程序, 然后使用[ <add> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md)元素添加自定义令牌处理程序。The is included in the default token handler collection; however, you can replace it with a custom session token handler by first specifying a [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md) element under the [<securityTokenHandlers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md) element to remove the default handler from the collection and then adding your custom token handler using the [<add>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md) element. 默认情况下, 你可以通过在``元素下包含[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)元素来指定默认的令牌生存期。By default, you can specify the default token lifetime by including the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element under the `` element. 可以通过`` 重写方法来设计自定义标记处理程序, 以便在元素下采用自定义配置元素, 从而提供处理它们的逻辑。You can design a custom token handler to take custom configuration elements under the `` element by overriding the method to provide the logic to process them. ## Examples 下面的 XML 演示如何在配置中使用类的实例替换标记处理程序集合中的默认会话安全标记处理程序。The following XML shows how to replace the default session security token handler in a token handler collection with an instance of the class in configuration. ```xml ```

span.span: <sessionTokenRequirement>
WIF and Web Farms
WIF Session Management

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetTransforms(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.CookieTransform> transforms) cil managed
Protected Sub SetTransforms (transforms As IEnumerable(Of CookieTransform))

span.span: The transforms to use.

summary.span: 设置要应用在 cookie 上的转换。

span.span: Sets the transforms that will be applied to cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置由属性返回的转换的列表。Sets the list of transforms returned by the property. 当对 cookie 进行编码时, 转换将按照它们在列表中的显示顺序进行应用。Transforms will be applied in the order in which they appear in the list when encoding a cookie and in the reverse order when decoding a cookie. > [!WARNING] > 如果参数为`null`, 则在调用以对 cookie 进行编码或解码时, 方法将引发异常。 `transforms`If the `transforms` parameter is `null`, an exception will be thrown from the method when it is called to encode or decode the cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 如果[ <在> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)配置文件中指定 sessionTokenRequirement 元素, 则通过方法将属性初始化为`lifetime`属性的值。By default, if the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element is specified in the configuration file, the property is initialized to the value of the `lifetime` attribute by the method.

span.span: Validates the specified session token and returns its claims.
The identities that are contained in the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行检查以确保指定的标记的作用域为指定的终结点 ID, 如果是, 则调用方法; 否则, 将引发。Performs a check to make sure that the specified token is scoped for the specified endpoint ID and, if so, invokes the method; otherwise, throws a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 具有 `null`或空属性的会话令牌被视为全局范围。Session tokens that have an property that is `null` or empty are considered to be globally scoped. 这会带来潜在的安全风险。This presents a potential security risk. 出于此原因, 应确保在会话令牌中设置属性。For this reason you should make sure that the property is set in your session tokens.

-or-
is .
is not assignable from .

span.span: The property of the specified token is not or empty and its value is different than that specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现将令牌序列化为 ws 安全会话 Feb2005 或 ws 安全会话 1.3 ``元素。The default implementation serializes the token into either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `` element.

The token to serialize.
An instance of .

summary.span: 使用指定 XML 编写器序列化指定令牌。

span.span: Serializes the specified token by using the specified XML writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现将指定的令牌序列化为 ws 安全会话 Feb2005 或 ws 安全会话 1.3 ``元素, 具体取决于属性的值。The default implementation serializes the specified token as either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `` element, depending on the value of the property. 属性序列化为`Id`特性。 The property is serialized as the `Id` attribute. 属性序列化为``子元素。 The property is serialized as the `` child element. 如果不`null`是 , 则将``属性序列化为元素。If not `null` the property is serialized as an `` element. 最后, 如果属性为`false`, 则将整个标记序列化为二进制数组, 并将其传递给要编码的方法。Finally, if the property is `false`, the entire token is serialized into binary array which is passed to the method to be encoded. 然后, 将编码的令牌作为 base64 编码值写入到由和属性指定的元素和命名空间。The encoded token is then written as a base64 encoded value to the element and namespace specified by the and properties. 如果属性为`true`, 则不序列化令牌。 If the property is `true`, the token is not serialized.
